DOD.description: Date of Death. Confirmed DOD if available, otherwise unconfirmed DOD.  Where no DOD set at Event date of notification of death.

Reported_Cause.description: Cause of Death given by sources other than registry

UCCode.description: ICD10 Code for underlying cause of death or TBC if not yet coded. First 3 characters only to be transferred to the RDS

MCCode1.description: ICD10 Code for multiple cause of death 1

MCCode2.description: ICD10 Code for multiple cause of death 2

MCCode3.description: ICD10 Code for multiple cause of death 3

MCCode4.description: ICD10 Code for multiple cause of death 4

MCCode5.description: ICD10 Code for multiple cause of death 5

MCCode6.description: ICD10 Code for multiple cause of death 6

MCCode7.description: ICD10 Code for multiple cause of death 7

MCCode8.description: ICD10 Code for multiple cause of death 8

MCCode9.description: ICD10 Code for multiple cause of death 9

MCCode10.description: ICD10 Code for multiple cause of death 10

MCCode11.description: ICD10 Code for multiple cause of death 11

MCCode12.description: ICD10 Code for multiple cause of death 12

MCCode13.description: ICD10 Code for multiple cause of death 13

MCCode14.description: ICD10 Code for multiple cause of death 14

MCCode15.description: ICD10 Code for multiple cause of death 15

Part1A.description: Text description of cause of death from Part1A of death certificate

Part1B.description: Text description of cause of death from Part1B of death certificate

Part1C.description: Text description of cause of death from Part1C of death certificate

Part1D.description: Text description of cause of death from Part1D of death certificate

Part2A.description: Text description of cause of death from Part2A of death certificate

Part2B.description: Text description of cause of death from Part2B of death certificate

Part2C.description: Text description of cause of death from Part2C of death certificate

Region.description: Region | England and Wales: Received from NSCIC (Health & Social Care Information Centre) or earlier equivalent. Scotland: Received from GRO NHSCR (General Register Office for Scotland, NHS Central Register). Northern Ireland: Death notified by HSCNI (Health and Social Care, Northern Ireland). Guernsey: Death information obtained from Guernsey registrar. Death Certificate: Death Certificate received
